solution_line_template: If Keaton climbed his ladder {keaton_climb_times} times, he covered a length of {keaton_ladder_height}*{keaton_climb_times} = <<{keaton_ladder_height}*{keaton_climb_times}={keaton_total_feet_climbed}>>{keaton_total_feet_climbed} feet.

Reece's ladder, {reece_ladder_shorter_by} feet shorter than Keaton's ladder, was {keaton_ladder_height}-{reece_ladder_shorter_by} = <<{keaton_ladder_height}-{reece_ladder_shorter_by}={reece_ladder_height}>>{reece_ladder_height} feet long.

If Reece climbed the ladder {reece_climb_times} times, he covered a length of {reece_climb_times}*{reece_ladder_height} = <<{reece_climb_times}*{reece_ladder_height}={reece_total_feet_climbed}>>{reece_total_feet_climbed} feet.

Keaton and Reece's total length covered while climbing the ladders is {reece_total_feet_climbed}+{keaton_total_feet_climbed} = <<{reece_total_feet_climbed}+{keaton_total_feet_climbed}={total_feet_climbed}>>{total_feet_climbed} feet.

Since one foot is equal to {inches_per_foot} inches, the total length they climbed the ladders in inches is {inches_per_foot}*{total_feet_climbed} = <<{inches_per_foot}*{total_feet_climbed}={total_inches_climbed}>>{total_inches_climbed} inches.
